tagline: Pitch decks, investor targeting, and term sheet analysis that turn good companies into funded ones
pros: Investor research and targeting by fit
Term sheet analysis in plain language

model_recommendations.notes: Complex reasoning, architecture, security, or financial analysis. Needs the best available model with full thinking/reasoning enabled.
